Question
========

In regression analysis, it is possible to test whether the coefficients are differ from zero. This is inferential statistics. Necessary conditions for this in regression analysis are:_____. I. The standard deviations of *y* from the sample are equal for each *x*. II. The averages of *y* from the population are equal for all *x*.

Answerlist
----------

* I is TRUE and II is false.
* I is false and II is true.
* I and II are false.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* I is TRUE and II is false: Incorrect
* I is false and II is true: Incorrect
* I and II are untrue: Correct
